data.prayer: Father, look after and teach the way that is best for the 987 believers living in Rasinski, Serbia.
data.verse: I will instruct you and teach you in the way you should go. I will counsel you with my loving eye on you.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Rasinski, Serbia
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Spirit, guide someone in the church in the state of Rasinski to a person ready to receive the message of the gospel, like Lydia, and who will then open her home to faith.
data.verse: One of those listening was a woman from the city of Thyatira named Lydia, a dealer in purple cloth. She was a worshiper of God. The Lord opened her heart to respond to Paul’s message.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 139 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Father, let love abound more and more in the church of Rasinski, Serbia.
data.verse: And this is my prayer: that your love may abound more and more in knowledge and depth of insight

data.prayer: Father, please raise up every one you have called in Rasinski, Serbia to become worthy of their calling, and offer spiritual sacrifices acceptable to you through Jesus.
data.verse: I urge you to live a life worthy of the calling you have received

data.prayer: Lord, Let your Kingdom come among the Egyptian, Balkan people. Let your will be done, as in heaven, so on earth.
Spirit, of the 107,936 people in the state of Rasinski who claim Christianity, challenge some of them to pick up your Word and read it for themselves today.
data.verse: Then you will know the truth, and the truth will set you free.

data.prayer: Father, we agree with your desire that the people in the state of Rasinski hear about you.
data.verse: "Those who were not told about him will see, and those who have not heard will understand."

data.prayer: Father, we suspect there is 1 believer for every 139 neighbors who are far from you in Rasinski. Please, give courage and opportunity to your children to speak boldly.
data.verse: Pray also for me, that whenever I speak, words may be given me so that I will fearlessly make known the mystery of the gospel.

location.name: Rasinski
location.people_groups_list: Albanian, Jew, Serbian-speaking, Chinese, general, Adyghe, Bosniak
